page.title: 15INTERVIEW WITH A POSTMAN
page.content: The postman makes 655 calls on his round which includes 14 different streets. He walks 4 miles on his round. His busiest time of the year is Christmas but this is followed by the quietest period in February. He begins work at 5.15am and finishes at 12.50pm. His duties are to sort and deliver the First and Second deliveries each day and to collect from pillar boxes. The First delivery takes 2 hours 15 minutes and the Second takes one and a half hours. He takes half an hour to sort the letters and altogether works for 5\ days a week. He travels to work on his own bike but makes deliveries on a GPO service bike. He delivers letters, bills, advertising matter, Football Pools coupons and Recorded Delivery items. He has been a postman for 34\ years.
